name: Glum Buster
description:
Glum Buster is a mind-bending trip through a mysterious, haunting alternate reality. Use your magic, wits, and curiosity to cleanse the world of glum and find a way back to your family. Experience the wonder of this indie cult classic.

  • Hauntingly beautiful pixel art graphics.
  • Gorgeous, immersive music and SFX.
  • 5 huge areas to explore, packed with mind-bending action/platforming puzzles.
  • Loads of secrets to discover.
  • Unique play mechanics to learn and master.
  • An unforgettable experience that sticks with you long after you play.
